Authors:
Sadia Nadir, Sehroon Khan, Dhanushka Nadeeshan Wanasinghe,
Saowaluck Tibpromma, Peter E Mortimer, Shahid Iqbal, Jianchu Xu
Title:
A new record of Aspergillus vadensis (Ascomycota) isolated
from soil in Yunnan Province, China
Keywords: morphology, phylogeny, section Nigri, soil fungi
Abstract:
During a survey of soil fungi in Yunnan Province, (China),
several isolates of the Aspergillus section Nigri were isolated. Based
on morphology and molecular analyses of ITS, Î²- tubulin and calmodulin
genes sequences, two isolates were identified as Aspergillus vadensis.
Our isolates of A. vadensis showed slight morphological variations when
compared with the type description. This is the first record of A.
vadensis from China
